subject: Dear Friend .
body:
Dear Friend .
Thank you for this privileged to communicate to you as regards
financial investment offer to invest in mining,or exotic properties
for commercial/residential and development
properties,hotels and any other viable opportunities you deem
lucrative based on your recommend will be highly welcomed. please,
Send your expression of interest .
Sincerely,
Mele Kyari.

subject: Re:   Dear Friend .
body:
Dear Mele Kyari,

Thank you for reaching out to me with this investment opportunity. I'm always interested in exploring new possibilities, especially when it comes to financial investments. Could you please provide me with more details about the exotic properties you mentioned? What kind of commercial opportunities are available, and what makes them lucrative?

I appreciate your time and look forward to hearing back from you.

Best wishes,
Michael
